title: Galactica intro credits font
content:
Hi everyone

Got another font to identify, something I’ve been trying to figure out. It’s the intro credits font from the new Battlestar Galactica, see the attachement for reference.

Help is appreciated, thanks in advance.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [galactica\_font.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20080330123832/http:/typophile.com/files/galactica_font.png) | 104.83 KB |

 [‹ Any ideas on this one?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080330123832/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41453 "Go to previous forum topic") [Roamfree.com Ad type ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080330123832/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41466 "Go to next forum topic")
author: LtCannonfodder
